类 SelectionButtons

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.menu.SelectionButtons
所有已实现的接口:
Drawable, Focusable, Scalable
public class SelectionButtons extends Object implements Scalable, Focusable, Drawable
Represents a collection of interactive selection buttons, including back, settings, play, and user options. Implements Scalable, Focusable, and Drawable for scaling, focus management, and rendering.
